title: The declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled concerning the Earl of Stamford and others his assistants; whom the King proclaimed traytors for executing the ordinance of the militia.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for G.G. for C. Latham and T. Creake,
notes: Order to print dated and signed: Sabbathi 23 Julii. 1642 John Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
These persons have acted acording to their duties and shall be protected by the power and authority of parliament. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
